quote: Don’t you call me a mindless philosopher, you overweight glob of grease!
speaker: C-3PO

quote: We’re doomed.
speaker: C-3PO

quote: But I was going into Tosche Station to pick up some power converters!
speaker: Luke Skywalker

quote: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
speaker: Leia Organa

quote: An elegant weapon for a more civilized age.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
speaker: Darth Vader

quote: Mos Eisley spaceport. You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: You don’t need to see his identification…These aren’t the droids you’re looking for.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: It’s the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs.
speaker: Han Solo

quote: Sorry about the mess.
speaker: Han Solo

quote: She may not look like much, but she’s got it where it counts, kid.
speaker: Han Solo

quote: Governor Tarkin, I should’ve expected to find you holding Vader’s leash. I recognized your foul stench when I was brought on board.
speaker: Leia Organa

quote: I felt a great disturbance in the Force. As if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: I suggest a new strategy, Artoo: Let the Wookiee win.
speaker: C-3PO

quote: Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.
speaker: Han Solo

quote: That’s no moon. It’s a space station.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: Who’s the more foolish? The fool or the fool who follows him?
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: Aren’t you a little short for a stormtrooper?
speaker: Leia Organa

quote: Somebody has to save our skins. Into the garbage chute, flyboy!
speaker: Leia Organa

quote: I got a bad feeling about this.
speaker: Han Solo

quote: When I left you I was but the learner. Now I am the master.
speaker: Darth Vader

quote: If you strike me down I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: It’s not impossible. I used to bullseye womp rats in my T-16 back home, they’re not much bigger than 2 meters.
speaker: Luke Skywalker

quote: Cover me, Porkins!
speaker: Biggs Darklighter

quote: Use the Force, Luke.
speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: What an incredible smell you've discovered
speaker: Han Solo
